selected_quotes: #Tips4EyeDocs Silicone oil migration along the optic nerve after intraocular tamponade.

citation.abstract:
We present a case of silicone oil migration trough the optic nerve in a diabetic patient with retinal detachment and review the etiologic mechanism and clinical implications.
Intracranial silicone oil migration is an uncommon complication associated with silicone oil tamponade.
citation.journal: Archivos de la Sociedad Espanola de Oftalmologia
citation.title: Migración de aceite de silicona a través del nervio óptico tras una vitrectomía por desprendimiento de retina

author.name: Tips4 EyeDocs
author.description: Personal opinions PhD Candidate, Biomedicine, Vision Impairment and Disability
